subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ decision to give this year’s opening day start to Bartolo Colon has created something of a stir, but the team has done quite well on opening days regardless of its starting pitcher.
snippet: The Mets’ decision to give this year’s opening day start to Bartolo Colon has created something of a stir, but the team has done quite well on opening days regardless of its starting pitcher.
